snippet: Four teenagers were wounded on Monday in a shooting at a playground in Brooklyn, the police said, the latest in a spate of gun violence involving young people.
abstract: Four teenagers are wounded in a shooting at a playground in Brooklyn, the latest in a spate of New York City gun violence involving young people.
lead_paragraph: Four teenagers were wounded on Monday in a shooting at a playground in Brooklyn, the police said, the latest in a spate of gun violence involving young people.

headline.seo: Four Teenagers Injured in Brooklyn Shooting
headline.main: Four Teenagers Are Shot in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Four Teenagers Are Shot in Brooklyn
